snippet: An Ecuadorean court upheld a ruling that the Chevron Corporation should pay $18 billion in damages to plaintiffs who accused it of polluting the Amazon jungle and damaging their health.
abstract: Ecuadorean court upholds a ruling that the Chevron Corporation should pay $18 billion in damages to plaintiffs who accused it of polluting the Amazon jungle and damaging their health.
lead_paragraph: An Ecuadorean court upheld a ruling that the Chevron Corporation should pay $18 billion in damages to plaintiffs who accused it of polluting the Amazon jungle and damaging their health.

headline.main: Ecuador: $18 Billion Ruling Against Chevron Is Upheld
headline.print_headline: Ecuador: $18 Billion Ruling Against Chevron Is Upheld
